xarray-validate documentation
=============================

Welcome to the xarray-validate documentation!

This is a simple xarray data validation framework with an API inspired by Pandera.

Core features inherited from xarray-schema:

* validation schemas for xarray datasets and data arrays;
* JSON serialization / deserialization.
